title: Picture for Today:  Exposition Reliquary Being Delivered
post:
Those who are in the London area may be interested in “From Wiseman to Manning”. Wiseman built the cathedral and Manning, one of the “eminent Victorians”, was known for his intervention in the dockers’ strike and his position on vivisection.
There has never been a Shroud exposition there.
http://rcdow.org.uk/news/from-wiseman-to-manning/
author: Louis
